subject: [NUS] Offer of Admission
body:
Dear XXX:

OFFER OF ADMISSION TO THE NATIONAL UNIVERSITY OF SINGAPORE AS A FULL FEE PAYING UNDERGRADUATE

I take great pleasure in offering you admission to the National University of Singapore for the following undergraduate degree programme(s) in Academic Year 2024:

Computer Engineering

With your scholastic and personal accomplishments, alongside your potential for future academic success, we are confident that you will bring unique and valuable contributions to the NUS community.

As a leading global university, it is our mission to prepare you to be future-ready and to be your companion for lifelong learning. We will be a guiding bridge between your academic and work life â€” facilitating your engagement with potential employers and helping to hone important skillsets necessary for the future of work.

We offer a variety of cross-disciplinary programmes and global opportunities. Our curriculum is constantly refined to stay relevant to the industry. Beyond the requisites of an academic degree, we provide rigorous and broad-based programmes that enable you to delve into multiple knowledge domains that suit your strengths and interests.

The NUS experience is further complemented by a vibrant residential programme and a community enriched with diverse social and cultural perspectives.

Please note that as a full fee paying student, you are not eligible for the Tuition Grant, scholarships and/or financial aid administered by the Singapore Ministry of Education (MOE) or NUS. Full fee paying students also do not need to serve the Tuition Grant obligation to work for a Singapore-based company for three years upon graduation. The current annual tuition fees payable by students not in receipt of MOE Tuition Grants are set out in the https://www.nus.edu.sg/registrar/docs/info/administrative-policies-procedures/ugtuitioncurrent.pdf

We sincerely hope that you will join us and await your response to our offer of admission via the NUS acceptance portal (http://nus.edu/accept) by 14 July 2024.

We greatly look forward to welcoming you to the NUS family.

Yours sincerely,

Prof Tan Eng Chye
President
National University of Singapore
